comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teddy_Wilson en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zutty_Singleton The presence of jazz greats at the Turkish Embassy no doubt had something to do with ambassador Münir Ertegün's sons Nesuhi and Ahmet. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nesuhi_Ertegun en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ahmet_Ertegun
